General.Name: Hunan New Wellful Co Ltd
General.Description: Hunan New Wellful Co.,Ltd. primarily engages in the breeding and supplying of pigs. The company is also involved in raw material processing, feed storage, meat processing, pig breeding, slaughtering, and trading. It offers its products under the U fresh and Chenfeng brand names in China, Macau, and Hong Kong. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.

3.Name: Ms. Yanfei  Luo
